name: Martian Invasion (Melbourne House)
overview: Fly your plane over the city, watching Martian Pods drop from the sky. A tripod or a flying machine will hatch out from the crater left by the Pod. The tripods shoot at you and the flying machine will try to crash into you. All the while a red weed starts growing and crawling. You must take out as many Martians as possible before your inevitable defeat. Published in both the Commodore 64 Games Book and the C+VG 1984/07 Book of Games.
